nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 203 is the June/July 2021 issue of Star Wars Insider. It was edited by Chris Cooper and published by Titan Magazines on June 22, 2021. It features a ranking of the top Rebel leaders, a breakdown of The Mandalorian's cultural impact, an interview with Robert Watts, an exclusive High Republic short story from Justina Ireland, and an interview with Neal Scanlan.

Travel, as the saying goes, broadens the mind, and so to inspire some wanderlust we've put together a guide to the Californian filming locations from the original Star Wars trilogy. For those looking to go further afield, we speak to the legendary original trilogy co-producer Robert Watts about his globe-trotting adventures, scouting locations for the Star Wars saga and Indiana Jones trilogy.

Creature and special makeup effects supervisor Neal Scanlan reveals how he came out of semi-retirement to bring his creative flair to the Star Wars galaxy, and we investigate how The Mandalorian (2019–present) became an instant, worldwide pop culture phenomenon. Plus, the first part of an all-new and exclusive The High Republic story by Justina Ireland!
All this and much more in Star Wars Insider #203!
